title: test: fails at compiling go1.1 in windows/amd64
body:
by **raul.san@sent.com**: 
go1.1 / Windows XP / AMD64

At compiling, it fails in certificate test:

ok      crypto/tls      0.371s
--- FAIL: TestSystemVerify (0.61 seconds)
        verify_test.go:279: #7: unexpected error: x509: certificate signed by unknown authority
        verify_test.go:288: #7: wanted 1 chains, got 0
FAIL
FAIL    crypto/x509     1.331s
